assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Godrej Properties Limited, together with its subsidiaries, primarily engages in the real estate construction, development, and other related activities in India. It develops residential, commercial, and township projects. Godrej Properties Limited was incorporated in 1985 and is based in Mumbai, India.
